name: .VFB File Extension
summary: Learn about .VFB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Font file created by FontLab Studio, a font authoring program; contains a designed font, which includes the glyphs that make up the alphabet and other symbols; stores the font in a vector format so that the glyphs can be scaled without losing quality.

content: When done editing fonts in FontLab Studio, you can export them to .TTF, .OTF, .PFB, and .PFA formats. Select File â†’ Generate Font... from the application menu.
VFB files can be opened by several FontLab products, including FontLab Studio, Fontographer, TypeTool, AsiaFont Studio, TransType Pro, and others.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
